wikipedia_page.main: Henry John Cecil Turner was a rugby union international who represented England in 1871 in the first international match.

response: *H.J.C. Turner, born in the Wartling Place the Rectory at Wartling in 1850, the son of the curate, played in the first rugby international in 1871.
*H.J.C. Turner, played for England in first international in 1871
